item.description:
This hike is about 6 miles and will take approx. 2 hrs. Bring enough water for you and your dog. Please keep your dog on a leash in the parking area. Once we get on the trail, those who want to let their dog off leash can do so.

*Please Note: There is a small fee to park in the lot at Sleeping Giant. If you want to avoid the fee, cars usually park along the street.

Get Directions to the Park at www.sgpa.org
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the park and go past the 1st parking lot on the right. Continue straight ahead and we will be parked on the left.
item.why: This is my first hike as the group organizer. I will be planning lots of hikes this summer and hope to have many of you attend. I hope it will be a great way for all of us to meet new people.
item.name: Hike at Sleeping Giant State Park
